# Loading libraries

```{r , message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(gridExtra)
library(rmdformats)
library(plotly)
```

```{r Getting Data, echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
data<- read_csv("Data/covid_aus.csv")
```

```{r structure}
glimpse(data)
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date, "%d/%m/%y"))

glimpse(data)
```
